name: Basic Platformer (Vircon32)
description:
Test your platforming skills with this simple retro-style 2D platformer. It includes 3 worlds with 10 levels each. The game starts easy but will progressively reach a harder difficulty, so be ready to persist if you want to see the later levels and the ending!

This is one of the first full games to be completed for Vircon32 game console (you can learn about it at its website). It is meant not just as a fun game, but also as an example project for anyone wanting to create games for the console. This game is open source, you can find the sources at the website or browse the code directly on GitHub.

Enjoy! Any feedback is welcome :)
